data.md:MetaData: Meteorological observations during SURPRIZE cruise from Off Grand Banks started at 1776-09-24
Ship: Surprize (6th Rate Frigate), Voyage from: Off Grand Banks, 1st Observer: Robert Linzee (Captain), Company: Royal Navy, Other ship information: 28G 593BM
